description: This skill allows followers of the Silverline CRM blog to hear and view Silverline's latest news. Users can request the latest blog post, which will be spoken back by Alexa. Additionally, a hyper link to the blog post where users can read about the post in more detail will be pushed to the Alexa mobile app as a card.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask CRM Blog what's the latest post
Alexa, use CRM Blog to tell me the latest news
Alexa, ask CRM Blog to get the latest blog post
name: CRM Blog
shortDescription: Get the latest CRM Blog Post form the Silverline Blog
